## Lesson goals and objectives

### Learning goals

- Understand the concept of object-oriented programming.
- Describe the S3 class system in <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i>.
- Explain method dispatch in the S3 class system.
- Develop good practices to name objects and functions in your <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i> workspace.

### Learning objectives

- Create objects of various S3 classes.
- Inspect their contents.
- Apply methods to objects of various classes.
